happy_paths.name: Lead to Conversion
steps: Agent explains the product, rules (10% drawdown), and benefits.
Customer asks clarifying questions about minimum deposits, withdrawals, and rules.
Agent provides answers and a registration link.
Customer completes registration and document verification.
Agent guides the customer on activating the x12 leverage ('Amplify') and connecting to the MT5 platform.
Customer confirms their account is set up and ready for trading.

deviations.name: Platform Technical Issues
deviations.description: Customer encounters technical problems during onboarding, funding, or platform use, requiring detailed agent troubleshooting or escalation to a support team.
deviations.trigger: Customer reports errors like 'no me deja entrar', 'no he podido pasar la plata', 'límite superado', or expresses confusion about the platform's interface.

deviations.name: Wrong Number / Off-Topic
deviations.description: The customer has contacted the business number by mistake for personal reasons, is sending spam, or is making an inquiry completely unrelated to the company's services.
deviations.trigger: Messages containing personal names ('Fari', 'Mono'), informal/inappropriate greetings ('Q mas perro'), spam links, or agent responses like 'Estas equivocado'.

deviations.name: Withdrawal Delay Escalation
deviations.description: An existing customer reports that a withdrawal has been processed on their end but is not reflecting in their crypto wallet after a significant amount of time. The sales agent must redirect them to the official support channel.
deviations.trigger: Customer states 'hice el retiro y no ha cargado' or 'aún no se ve reflejado el saldo en la wallet'.

deviations.name: Inexperienced User
deviations.description: The customer reveals they have no trading experience, making them unsuitable for the primary product. The agent must pivot the conversation to offer educational resources or an academy instead of the leveraged account.
deviations.trigger: Customer explicitly states they have no experience, e.g., 'No tengo experiencia,' 'Voy empezando la verdad.'
